scene_description_enriched: A bearded monk, wearing a hooded brown robe over a blue tunic, is seated in a forest setting, with his hands clasped in prayer over an open book. Behind him, a small, dark building with a reddish roof is visible, partially obscured by trees. The forest is dense with green foliage and tall trees. To the right of the monk, a wild boar is depicted, its head emerging from behind a tree. The monk has a halo, indicating his sanctity.
scene_interpretation: Saint Anthony Abbot in the Wilderness
